name: Archive Fur Den Thiereschen Magnetismus (Jena) [IAPSOP]
content:
Archive Fur Den Thiereschen Magnetismus (Jena) [IAPSOP] About Archives Practices Contribute Contacts Search     Periodical: Archive Fur Den Thiereschen Magnetismus (Jena) Summary:  From Pat Deveney's database: Archiv fur den Thierischen Magnetismus. 1804--1808 Irregular Jena, Germany. Language: German. Editor: August W. Nordhoff. Publisher: Hofbuchdrucker Gopferdts. 1/1, 1804. Two issues appeared in Jena in 1804 and catalogues state that a later volume was published in 1808. Henry Carrington Bolton, A Catalogue of Scientific and Technical Periodicals, 1665-1882 (Washington, 1885), 72. Bayerische Staatsbibliothek. Issues:Archiv Fur Den Thierischen Magnetismus V1 N1 1804 Archiv Fur Den Thierischen Magnetismus V1 N2 1804
